name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minimal Astronomy Picture of the Day (APOD)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a stunning NASA astronomy picture each day when you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bringing you a dose of beautiful star stuff when you open a new tab.

Keeping it simple and elegant, without distracting you from what you opened the new tab to do.
